    • Method Detail

      • enumerate

        public static int[] enumerate()
        Enumerate all the joystick devices on the platform and instantiate a LinuxJoystick handle for each of them, if possible.
        Returns:
        An array of information integer with the following format:
        ByteOffset_Value
        3_________ nothing
        2_________ Number of axes
        1_________ Number of buttons
        0_________ Some sort of identification as defined by the constants

      • get

        public static LinuxJoystick get(int index)
        Get the handle for the specified joystick device
        Parameters:
        index - Enumerated index
        Returns:
        Reference to the joystick device

      • getFirstUsableDevice

        public static LinuxJoystick getFirstUsableDevice()
        Get an open joystick. Will enumerate if the devices have not been enumerated yet
        Returns:
        Handle to first usable joystick, null if there is none

      • BUTTONS

        public static int BUTTONS(int joyinfo)
        Return number of buttons for the specified joystick information
        Parameters:
        joyinfo - Joystick information integer
        Returns:
        Number of buttons

      • AXES

        public static int AXES(int joyinfo)
        Return number of axes for the specified joystick information
        Parameters:
        joyinfo - Joystick information integer
        Returns:
        Number of axes

      • ID

        public static int ID(int joyinfo)
        Return the device ID for the specified joystick information
        Parameters:
        joyinfo - Joystick information integer
        Returns:
        Device ID
